Module swan.g09.cs230a2
Package swan.g09.cs230a2

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
swan.g09.cs230a2.Tile
Direct Known Subclasses:
Barnacle, Block, BoatPath, Bug, Button, ChipSocket, ComputerChip, Dirt, Exit, ExtraLife, Frog, Ice, IncreaseTime, Invinc, Key, LockedDoor, Path, PinkBall, Player, Speed, Trap, Wall, Water
public abstract class Tile extends Object
The Tile class represents a single tile in a grid-based system, such as a game map. Each tile has properties like its type, position, and walkability.
